author: craigmcc
msg: Update the convenience base classes to use the new ActionMapping class
instead of the deprecated ActionMappingBase class.
Submitted by:	Matthias Kerkhoff <make@BESToffers.de>

author: craigmcc
msg: Enhance the <bean:define> tag to allow creation of literal String-valued
beans, without having to resort to scripting code.  For example, you can
now say:
<bean:define id="com.acme.fileName" scope="session" value="homePage"/>
instead of
session.setAttribute("com.acme.fileName", "homePage");
Note that you cannot use <jsp:useBean> to do this, because dotted names
are not legal values to the "id" attribute.
Submitted by:	Pierre Metras <genepi@sympatico.ca>

author: craigmcc
msg: Documentation updates to reflect the switch to the new
org.apache.struts.action.ActionErrors object for collecting error
messages.
Submitted by:	Matthias Kerkhoff <make@BESToffers.de>

author: craigmcc
msg: Make the implementation class for <form:link> extend BaseHandlerTag, so
that it can inherit the usual set of CSS and JavaScript event attributes.
Also, you can now use <form:link linkName="xxx"/> to create an anchor
definition (<a name="xxx">) element.
Submitted by:	Pierre Metras <genepi@sympatico.ca>, 10-Nov-2000.
(Better late than never :-)

author: craigmcc
msg: When performing a <bean:include/> in a page that is part of a session,
pass the session identifier along on the generated request so that it will
also be part of the same session.
Submitted by: Colin Sampaleanu <colin@Bspark.com>
